title: ADC LF Team Plat-Dia
body:
Hey,
ADC Main is looking for a Team to Flex and Play Tournaments. Just wishing to learn, progress and having a nice time.
Willing to play the Champs that are needed. Iam open to criticism and always trying to improve.
Discord and Teamspeak available aswell
Link to OP.GG
Nirolex: http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Nirolex 

Add me in-game client for further details:
**Nirolex **
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
